verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2822>called<s%> to be an <S%G652>apostle<s%>, <S%G873>separated<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>,
<S%G3739>(Which<s%> he had promised <S%G4279>before<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G1124>scriptures<s%>,)

<S%G4012>Concerning<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> Jesus Christ our <S%G3588>Lord<s%>, which was <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4690>seed<s%> of <S%G1138>David<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>;

And <S%G3724>declared<s%> to be the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>, <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G42>holiness<s%>, <S%G1537>by<s%> the <S%G386>resurrection<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%>:

<S%G1223>By<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G651>apostleship<s%>, <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G5218>obedience<s%> to the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%>, <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>:
<S%G1722>Among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G2822>called<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>:

To <S%G3956>all<s%> that <S%G5607>be<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4516>Rome<s%>, <S%G27>beloved<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2822>called<s%> to be <S%G40>saints<s%>: <S%G5485>Grace<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G4412>First<s%>, I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> is spoken <S%G2605>of<s%> <S%G1722>throughout<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3144>witness<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G3000>serve<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G5613>that<s%> without <S%G89>ceasing<s%> I <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3417>mention<s%> of you always in my <S%G5216>prayers<s%>;

Making <S%G1189>request<s%>, if by any <S%G1513>means<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> at <S%G4218>length<s%> I might have a prosperous <S%G2137>journey<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G1971>long<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I may <S%G3330>impart<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5486>gift<s%>, to the <S%G1519>end<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> may be <S%G4741>established<s%>;

<S%G5124>That<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%>, that I may be comforted <S%G4837>together<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G240>mutual<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G5216>yours<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1700>mine<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G50>have<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G50>ignorant<s%>, <S%G80>brothers<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G4178>oftentimes<s%> I <S%G4388>purposed<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>(but<s%> was <S%G2967>hindered<s%> until <S%G1204>now<s%>,) <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G1484>Nations<s%>.

I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3781>debtor<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> to the <S%G915>Barbarians<s%>; <S%G2532>both<s%> to the <S%G4680>wise<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> to the <S%G453>unwise<s%>.

<S%G3779>So<s%>, as much as <S%G2596>in<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G2596>is<s%>, I am <S%G4289>ready<s%> to preach the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G4516>Rome<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G1870>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1870>ashamed<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> to every <S%G3956>one<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G4100>believes<s%>; to the <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to the <S%G1672>Greek<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> in <S%G1722%G99999>it<s%> <S%G601>is<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>: <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, The <S%G1342>just<s%> shall <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G763>ungodliness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2722>hold<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%>;

<S%G1360>Because<s%> that which may be <S%G1110>known<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5318>manifest<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G5319>shown<s%> it to <S%G846>them<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the invisible <S%G517>things<s%> of <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2937>creation<s%> of the <S%G2889>world<s%> are clearly <S%G2529>seen<s%>, being <S%G3539>understood<s%> by the things that are <S%G4161>made<s%>, <S%G5037>even<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G126>eternal<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2305>Godhead<s%>; so <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1511>are<s%> without <S%G379>excuse<s%>:

Because <S%G1360>that<s%>, when they <S%G1097>knew<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> him <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2228>neither<s%> were <S%G2168>thankful<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> became <S%G3154>vain<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1261>imaginations<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G801>foolish<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> was <S%G4654>darkened<s%>.
Professing <S%G5335>themselves<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%>, they became <S%G3471>fools<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G236>changed<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G862>uncorruptible<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> a <S%G1504>image<s%> made <S%G3667>like<s%> <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4071>birds<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> fourfooted <S%G5074>animals<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> creeping <S%G2062>things<s%>.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3860>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, to <S%G818>dishonor<s%> their <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> <S%G1722>between<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>:

<S%G3748>Who<s%> <S%G3337>changed<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>into<s%> a <S%G5579>lie<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4573>worshiped<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3000>served<s%> the <S%G2937>creature<s%> more <S%G3844>than<s%> the <S%G2936>Creator<s%>, <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2128>blessed<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%>. <S%G281>Amen<s%>.

<S%G1223>For<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3860>up<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G819>vile<s%> <S%G3806>affections<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5037>even<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2338>women<s%> did <S%G3337>change<s%> the <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G5540>use<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G3844>against<s%> <S%G5449>nature<s%>:

<S%G5037>And<s%> <S%G3668>likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G730>men<s%>, <S%G863>leaving<s%> the <S%G5446>natural<s%> <S%G5540>use<s%> of the <S%G2338>woman<s%>, <S%G1572>burned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3715>lust<s%> one toward <S%G1519>another<s%>; <S%G240><s%> <S%G730>men<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G730>men<s%> <S%G2716>working<s%> that which is <S%G808>unseemly<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G618>receiving<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> that <S%G489>recompense<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4106>error<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G1163>meet<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> they <S%G1381>did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1381>like<s%> to <S%G2192>retain<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> their <S%G1922>knowledge<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3860>over<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> a <S%G96>reprobate<s%> <S%G3563>mind<s%>, to <S%G4160>do<s%> those <S%G3588>things<s%> which <S%G2520>are<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2520>fitting<s%>;

Being filled <S%G4137>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%>, <S%G4202>fornication<s%>, <S%G4189>wickedness<s%>, <S%G4124>covetousness<s%>, <S%G2549>maliciousness<s%>; <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G5355>envy<s%>, <S%G5408>murder<s%>, <S%G2054>debate<s%>, <S%G1388>deceit<s%>, evil <S%G2550>manners<s%>; <S%G5588>whisperers<s%>,

<S%G2637>Backbiters<s%>, haters of <S%G2319>God<s%>, <S%G5197>despiteful<s%>, <S%G5244>proud<s%>, <S%G213>boasters<s%>, <S%G2182>inventors<s%> of evil <S%G2556>things<s%>, <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents<s%>,
Without <S%G801>understanding<s%>, <S%G802>covenant-breakers<s%>, without natural <S%G794>affection<s%>, <S%G786>implacable<s%>, <S%G415>unmerciful<s%>:

<S%G3748>Who<s%> <S%G1921>knowing<s%> the <S%G1345>judgment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4238>commit<s%> such <S%G5108>things<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%>, <S%G235%G99999>but<s%> have pleasure <S%G4909>in<s%> them <S%G3588>that<s%> do <S%G4238>them<s%>.
